body.name: Nilight Driver Side Taillight Assembly for 2009 2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 2016 2017 2018 Dodge Ram 1500 2500 3500 Rear Lamp Replacement OE Style w/Bulbs and Harness Left Side, 2 Year Warranty

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Pair of Driver and Passenger Side

features: Compatibility: The taillight assemblies are compatible with 2009-2018 Dodge Ram 1500; 2019-2021 Dodge Ram 1500 Classic; 2010-2019 Dodge Ram 2500/3500. Not suitable for 2013-2021 models with Factory LED Tail Lights. Please confirm the vehicle fitment before ordering. Replace Part Number: CH2818124, CH2819124, 55277415AD, 55277415AF, 55277414AE.

Durability: The high-impact housing withstands shock and vibration. With fully sealed silicon prevents environmental damages including freezing, foggy, fading, corrosion, and provides reliable service in sorts of weather conditions such as rain, snow, or dust storms, enabling your car looks better and drive safer.

DOT Compliance and safe Driving: To ensure driving safety for you and the oncoming driving circumstance, our 2009 2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 2016 2017 2018 Dodge Ram 1500; 2019 2020 2021 Dodge Ram 1500 Classic; 2010-2019 Dodge Ram 2500/3500 taillight are DOT & SAE compliant. Taillight will upgrade your lighting, making your vehicle easier to see for other drivers.

Simple Installation: Plug-and-play operation, OE taillight socket and replacement for the stock taillight, easily for installation without any drilling or modification. (NOTE: Professional installation would be highly recommended).
Package Includes: 1× Driver Side Tail Light.Bulbs are included. 2 Year Warranty by Nilight.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nilight Taillight Assembly For Dodge Ram: 2009 2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 2016 2017 2018 Dodge Ram 1500 2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 2016 2017 2018 Dodge Ram 2500 3500 2019 2020 2021 Dodge Ram 1500 Classic Note: Not compatible with 2013-2021 models with LED taillights with Factory LED Tail Lights

Superior Material Boost Nighttime Visibility Advanced taillights make your vehicle highly visible to other drivers and passengers. Impact-resistant Lens To meet or exceed the OE ones in function upgraded materials, which are UV & shock-resistant to prevent yellowing or cracking for a longer lifespan. Durable Taillight Assembly Durable tail light assembly with bulb for high performance and long life. One-way Vent The structure is well sealed to keep water and dust from getting inside, plus one-way vents help keep moisture out due to temperature differences.

Strickly Test Temperature & Humidity Test To ensure that the unit can withstand a wide range of temperature without reduce light output safety. Dust Test To ensure the unit is preperly sealed against harmfull road dust and debris. Salt Spray Test To ensure that the unit can withstand against oxidation caused by salt on the coastal area and from winter condition. Moisture Test To ensure that the unit do not cause moisture buildup leading to reduce visibility.

Installation Step 1 Open the tailgate, loosen the screws to remove the taillight. Step 2 Remove factory taillight sockets and bulbs.(Bulbs are included. You can use the factory bulbs.) Step 3 Connect the new tail light plugs to original sockets. Step 4 Located taillight assembly, connect taillight harness, seat taillight assembly in place. Professional Installation is highly recommended.

1.Taillight Detail: Turn Signal Light/ Brake Light：3157；Running Light：3157；Reversing Light：T15 2.Replace Part Number: CH2818124, CH2819124, 55277415AD, 55277415AF, 55277414AE. 3.2 Year Warra nty honor by Nilight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement for my Work Vehicle
reviews.reviewText: These fit great on a 2011 Dodge Ram Pick-Up truck. These were a PERFECT fit, they swapped right in & fit like OEM taillights. They are a HUGE improvement to what I had. My last ones were horrible looking. These ones look nice & fresh. Now I need to clean the rest of the truck so that it matches with how clean the new lights are. HahaI would recommend for dodge ram

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very easy to install.
reviews.reviewText: I had both lights swapped out in 30-45 minutes and the new lights look great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits like a glove
reviews.reviewText: These are a perfect aftermarket replacement to your OE’s. Installation was quick and painless as the go in the opposite as removal. They had no leaks or moisture getting inside and look great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good OE replacement
reviews.reviewText: pro: good OE replacement, includes needed bulbs, easy to install (lots of youtube videos to show you how)con: none really

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit and it comes with bulbs
reviews.reviewText: These look just as good as factory at a much lower pricepoint. The bulbs are installed and it's just plug in and a couple screws and your done. Edges are taillights are built well with tightly sealed edges where the face of the twilight meets the back housing. No moisture build up and I've run these in some pretty severe weather conditions. I'm very happy with the looks, build quality, and the fact the bulbs are already there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick, Easy, & Fits Like A Glove
reviews.reviewText: I originally ordered this item to replace my tail light that was cracked during an incident. Starting with the packaging and the shipping, the item arrive quickly, and everything was neat and well put together. Regarding the installation process, let’s start with the instructions. They were printed in color and in a decent size font. Next, to install the items took very little time to do. This is my first time replacing my tail lights and if I could put a time on it, I would say it took me 20 minutes tops to take out my current tail lights and put the new ones on. The features that I like the most about this item is that it came with the bulbs already pre-installed, and they provided you with a set of gloves to use. This is a plus considering that I am not super keen on getting my hands really dirty unnecessarily. Overall, I would give this product a five out of five for presentation, ease of installation, and functionality of the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are just as nice as the factory taillights! They fit just the same and have a very high gloss finish to them. Why would I want to spend $100+ more for Mopar that break just as earth in a collision. Not saying that I want to get rear ended again anytime soon. The sockets fit perfectly in their housing and are water proof tight!
They look great they are bright, and it took about 20 minutes to have them installed in my truck. Worth every penny.
